name: serial-monitor
description: VS Code Serial Monitor Extension with MCP integration for AI agents, featuring background monitoring, session logging, and Python-based serial communication

tools.description: Provides MCP tools for AI agents to interact with serial devices programmatically. Enables automated device communication, monitoring, and debugging through Copilot integration.
tools.usage: Use @serial-monitor in chat to interact with connected devices. Available tools: connect, send, read, list-ports, session-info, start-watch, stop-watch.

languageModelTools.name: serial_monitor_connect
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Connect to a serial port with auto-detection for Raspberry Pi Pico devices. Use when user wants to connect to a device, start monitoring, or establish communication with hardware.

port.description: Serial port path (e.g., 'COM9') or 'auto' to detect Pico

languageModelTools.name: serial_monitor_send
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Send data to connected serial device. Use when user wants to send commands, control device, or transmit data to hardware.

languageModelTools.name: serial_monitor_read
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Read data from serial port for specified duration. Use when user wants to capture device output, read sensor data, or monitor device communication.

languageModelTools.name: serial_monitor_list_ports
languageModelTools.modelDescription: List all available serial ports. Use when user wants to discover devices, see available connections, or troubleshoot connectivity issues.

languageModelTools.name: serial_monitor_session_info
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Get information about current and historical sessions. Use when user wants to view session history, check current status, or analyze logging data.

languageModelTools.name: serial_monitor_start_watch
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Start background monitoring with pattern matching. Use when user wants to monitor for specific patterns, watch for errors, or set up automated monitoring.

watch_for.description: Array of patterns to watch for

languageModelTools.name: serial_monitor_check_watch
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Check status of background monitoring task. Use when user wants to see monitoring results, check if patterns were found, or get watch task status.

languageModelTools.name: serial_monitor_stop_watch
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Stop background monitoring task. Use when user wants to cancel monitoring, stop background tasks, or end automated watching.

serialMonitor.defaultBaudRate.description: Default baud rate for serial connections

serialMonitor.bufferLines.description: Number of lines to keep in buffer

serialMonitor.autoDetectPico.description: Automatically detect Raspberry Pi Pico devices

serialMonitor.backgroundMonitoring.description: Enable passive background monitoring of COM9

serialMonitor.maxSessionFiles.description: Maximum number of session files to keep (1-100)

serialMonitor.maxFileSize.description: Maximum file size in MB before rotation (1-100)

serialMonitor.sessionDirectory.description: Directory name for storing session files (relative to workspace)

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node build/esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node build/esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
